name: Link (itch) (the1337est)
description:
Link is a colorful puzzle game made by Gaurav Tripathi (@the1337est) for Mini Jam 62: Colors.


How to Play

Use mouse left-click to click on a Tile to select it, and then click on another tile to swap the two tiles. The aim of the game is to create a smooth gradient from start to finish, so the two symbols can merge to become one.

Click on the Play button on bottom right when playing a puzzle to check if the solution is correct.

  • Game Design & Code: Gaurav Tripathi (@the1337est)

Thanks for playing.
